meanings.definition: A type of bet in horse racing where the bettor must select the first two finishers in a race in any order.
meanings.sent1: I placed a quinella on the horse race, picking the two horses I thought would finish first and second.
meanings.sent2: In the quinella bet, you can win as long as the two horses you choose finish in the top two positions.
meanings.sent3: Trying to predict the quinella in a race can be tricky but exciting!
meanings.sent4: Selecting the quinella is like solving a puzzle with the horses as pieces.
meanings.sent5: The quinella bet adds an extra layer of suspense to the horse race.
